text: foreign
To His Highness
Faisal
bin faram or furana
Minister for foreign affairs of Saudi
Arabia
in the name of God the compassionate the
merciful excellencies
president of the general assembly
Secretary General of the U.N ladies and
gentlemen I greet you and been blessing
to God be upon you
eighth session of the general assembly
and wish him every success in his
functions we also thank his Excellency
Mr Chava Karoshi for his remarkable
efforts as president of the previous
session
we pay tribute to the secretary in
general for his tireless efforts to
strengthen the effectiveness of the
bodies of the U.N in order to attain the
Charter's goals and principles
Saudi Arabia affirms that member states
must be committed to respecting the U.N
Charter the principle of the
international equality for a better
future for Humanity based on mutual
respect for sovereignty Independence and
the values of member states as well as
the principle of non-interference in
Internal Affairs resolving conflicts
through peaceful means and non-use of
force or the threat of force the vision
of Saudi Arabia for 2030 promotes the
efforts for construction and development
to meet the needs of future generations
and will help to empower women and young
people by developing their creativity
and Innovative capacity to consolidate
the values of openness dialogue
tolerance and coexistence
for Saudi Arabia human rights are of
crucial importance our laws and
regulations include clear text regarding
the promotion and protection of those
rights the approach taken by the kingdom
Saudi Arabia
aims to ensure a comprehensive and
Lasting recovery based on the individual
to develop the present to afford a
future through knowledge our country has
enacted a number of laws and has also
amended existing laws in order to
promote the Dignity of the citizen and
protect livelihoods and decent living
while ensuring protection for all
we affirmed that security in the Middle
East reason requires the acceleration of
the Quest for a just comprehensive
solution to the Palestinian issue the
solution must be based on resolutions on
the international Arena and must bring
about a peace to that allows Palestinian
people to have an independent state
within 1967 borders with East Jerusalem
as its capital we reaffirm our rejection
and condemnation of all unilateral
measures that are a flagrant violation
of international law
and undermines Regional International
efforts by hindering the process of
finding political solution the kingdom
strives to support all efforts to
bolster security and stability and to
focus on inclusive development to create
a favorable space for dialogue and to
reduce tension
and to encourage the region states to
avoid any escalation and to exchange
benefits and interests in order to meet
the aspirations of the Region's people
Saudi Arabia is striving to implement
the principle of collective action
in order to build a better future for
the region and for the entire world
therefore we have hosted many joint
Regional Summits as part of the gulf
Corporation Council and the Arab League
which we take active part in and so do
all of the states of the region
including Syria we believe that
resolving the Syrian conflict a crisis
would contribute to stabilizing the
region and the world we would like to
see stability return to the region
therefore we have led negotiations with
Iran and Baghdad and muscad and this
culminated in the Beijing agreement on
resuming diplomatic ties and direct
communication between our two countries
based on mutual respect and respect for
sovereignty independent security and
non-interference and growth respecting
the UN Charter and the charter of the
OIC
President we strive to preserve space
peace and stability in Yemen and
therefore are taking measures to stop
the crisis in the country and alleviate
the suffering of our brotherly people of
Yemen by working
unwaveringly to find a political
solution to re-establish feast and
Security in Yemen while preventing any
threat against the region when it comes
to Lebanon we are standing by the sides
of the Lebanese people our brothers and
call on all the Lebanese parties to make
political and economic reforms that are
comprehensive and structural to allow
Lebanon to overcome the current crisis
we affirm the need for the Lebanon
Lebanese state to extend authority to
all of its territory while respecting
the relevant Security Council
resolutions and the Italian agreement
this would contribute to improving
security to stopping drug trafficking
and terrorist activities which are
undermining security of the country
region and world as for Iraq for Saudi
Arabia security and stability in Iraq
are essential
for the entire region we reaffirm our
constant support for security
development and territorial Integrity as
well as to the Arab identity and social
fabric of Iraq as for the student needs
issue we are deeply concerned about the
escalations and military conflicts
between the Sudanese Army and the rapid
support forces so we call for the
de-escalation in Sudan and to alleviate
the crisis we hosted in Jeddah the
parties to the conflict together with
the U.S Saudi Arabia is working actively
to protect civilians and to guarantee
delivery of age to the population
we have since the beginning of the
crisis constantly taken humanitarian
action by conducting evacuation
operations by sea of thousands of
Sudanese and the citizens of neighboring
and brotherly countries and supported
U.N the U.N Mission there which was
caught in the crossfire his majesty yeah
the custodian of the holy sites has
launched a popular initiative to raise
funds for the student news people his
majesty also decreed the allocation of
100 million dollars as humanitarian
assistance to an emergency fund through
the king Islam and Center for
humanitarian assistance
in parallel with these efforts
working in the field in June we presided
over the high level donor conference
together with other International
Partners during this conference donors
committed to mobilizing humanitarian
assistance to respond to the crisis in
Sudan and to provide more than 1.5
billion dollars for this we deeply hope
that these efforts will be successful
Saudi Arabia also reaffirms the
importance of strengthening security and
stability in Libya guaranteeing its
sovereignty Independence and territorial
Integrity by putting an end to foreign
interference in its Internal Affairs my
country supports the total ceasefire and
the appeal by Libya
for the immediate and total withdrawal
of all foreign forces combatants and
mercenaries in accordance with
resolution 2570 of a security Council of
we also read from the importance of
security and stability stability in
Afghanistan
and that it should not serve as a refuge
for terrorist organizations we call for
respect for the fundamental rights of
the Afghan people including the women of
right of women to education and
employment and we call for stepping up
International Regional efforts to
provide humanitarian and economic aid to
alleviate the suffering of the Afghan
people as for the crisis between Russia
and Ukraine we once again call for an
end to this crisis to reduce its impact
its negative impact on security and
stability throughout the world we should
spare no effort toward this end in order
to find a peaceful solution
to these disagreements on respecting
international law in order to protect
the interests of all we must continue
humanitarian efforts and to do so
the Prime Minister has made efforts with
regards to the party the states concerns
when it comes to a prisoner exchange for
different nationalities also Ukraine was
invited to take part in a an Arab Summit
in Jeddah in August we hosted a meeting
of the National Security Council
bringing together representatives of
more than 40 States and organizations
Mr President to reaffirmed the
importance of efforts to eliminate
nuclear weapons to this end the
International Community must honor its
commitments under the existing
International treaties and laws in order
to build a world free of nuclear weapons
especially in the Middle East
we also reaffirmed the importance of
maintaining International Peace and
security and is willing to employ good
offices to resolve national
International and Regional conflicts in
accordance with the principles of
international law from my country
security and stability
are not possible in any region of the
world without cooperation and
coordination between states to promote
development and progress and to prevent
an arms race to acquire these
destructive weapons that threaten
Humanity our International Community has
made great strides
when it comes to combating terrorism and
extremism we must continue to work
tirelessly to counter and eliminate this
Scourge which runs counter to all
religions beliefs and races
the world must show firmness and
determination when it comes to
supporting or sponsoring terrorism or
extremism we must reject all forms of
attacks against sacred values
and the propagation of hate and
islamophobia under any pretext and
prevent incidents such as the burning of
the Holy Quran we warn against the
gravity of these acts which jeopardize
mutual respect understanding between
peoples and which hinder International
efforts
toward tolerance moderation
and rejection of extremism we promote an
approach that would bolster the culture
of Peace globally we welcome the
solution adopted by the Human Rights
Council
by the extraordinary session of the
Ministers of Foreign Affairs rather
of the OIC
in order to come back to recent
incidents of profaning in the Quran and
we welcome the adoption by the Human
Rights Council of the resolution
entitled combating religious hatred
and incitement to hate speech and
discrimination and violence we promote
dialogue and cooperation between
cultures and Civilizations for peace and
understanding throughout the world while
respecting the relevant International
instruments pertaining to Human Rights
Mr President the stability of global the
global energy Market is an important
prerequisite for global economic growth
we are striving to preserve a stability
reliability sustainability and security
of the global oil markets and to meet
the needs of consumers to guarantee a
safe and beneficial economy for
producers and consumers at a global
level we are constantly focusing on the
importance of collective cooperation
with the obec OPEC
in VLS in order to promote the
reliability and stability of a global
crude oil markets the OPEC Payless group
has taken an approach that helps to
control the market through a preventive
approach that thus contributes to Market
stability and balance this clearly is
illustrated by the stability of the oil
Market in 2022 compared to other energy
markets such as that of natural gas and
coal Mr President we are aware of the
need to address the challenge of climate
change therefore Saudi Arabia
is very interested in reducing emissions
and in promoting adaptation measures
here we call for a gradual and
responsible transition toward clean
energy systems with low emissions using
all available sources of energy to
ensure sustainability and all efforts
must be combined in order to attain the
goals that we want taking to account
National and Regional circumstances as
well as socioeconomic circumstances
sustainable development we know this is
a massive Challenge and we'd like to
consolidate our leading role throughout
the world when it comes to
sustainability therefore we have
launched two initiatives called a green
Saudi Arabia and a a green Middle East
to protect the environment and to reduce
carbon emissions greenhouse gas
emissions and to promote a living
quality of life we are working to
increase the use of renewable energy and
to reduce emissions for sustainable
development the kingdom has announced an
increased contribution a doubled
contribution
for reducing emissions compared to 2015
so this is a 278 million tons
in the years to come and we want we aim
to achieve a carbon neutrality as
advocated by the circular economy
approach we
also have an ambitious policy towards
the future we therefore have
applied
rather we are working to
promote better governance of Water
Resources
based on our ambitious vision for the
future we have asked to host the Expo
2030 with the topic the era of change
together for a four-sided tomorrow
and we will focus on prospects for the
future during this Expo a future that's
focused on technology and achieving the
sdgs it will be an excellent opportunity
to promote projects with universal
impact that can foster cooperation in
order to find Solutions through
Innovation inclusiveness and
sustainability these are all factors
that are at the very Heart Of The World
Expo 2030 in Riyadh in closing
we would like to thank all the member
states that supported my countries the
candidacy and ask other states to do the
same
in conclusion Mr President
we would like to convey to the world our
message values and principles in a
spirit of partnership and respect to lay
the groundwork for a better future for
Humanity thank you for your attention
to thank the minister for foreign
affairs of Saudi Arabia
